alert.note: Alert for Athens; Gallia; Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 8:12AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Meigs, northeastern Gallia, southeastern Vinton, southwestern Athens and north central Mason Counties through 845 AM EST... At 811 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Rutland, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pomeroy, Albany, Rutland, Mason, Middleport, Chester, Syracuse, Hartford City, Vinton, Wilkesville, Cheshire, Lakin, Darwin, Dyesville, Salem Center, Harrisonville, Dexter, Carpenter and Kyger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
